instructions.navigation:
Follow the instructions.
Scan the QR code of the next waypoint.
instructions.scanQRYouAre: Scan the QR code where you are

toast.cannotChooseWaypoint: Cannot choose the same waypoint as destination

youAreArrived: You are arrived at the destination
